text: "Photograph" is a 1973 song by Ringo Starr and taken from his third studio album Ringo. It was co-written by George Harrison and Ringo Starr. It went to number 1 in Australia, Canada and the United States. It went to the top 10 in Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, South Africa, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. title: Photograph (Ringo Starr song)
